Rooms.Name: West of House
Rooms.Description: This is an open field west of the white house, with a boarded front door.

Rooms.Name: North of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the north side of a white hosue. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: South of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: Behind House
Rooms.Description: You are behind the white house. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.

Rooms.Name: Forest 1
Rooms.Description: This is a forest, with trees in all directions around you.

Rooms.Name: Forest 2
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. One particularly large tree with some low branches stands here

Rooms.Name: Large Tree
Rooms.Description: You are about 10 feet above the ground nestled among some large branches.The nearest branch above you is above your reach. On the branch is a small birds nest. In the bird's nest is a

Rooms.Name: Forest 3
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. To the east, there appears to be sunlight.

Rooms.Name: Clearing
Rooms.Description: You are in a clearing, with a forest suurounding you on the west and south.

Rooms.Name: Kitchen
Rooms.Description: You are in the kitchen of the white house. A passage leads to the west and a dark staircase can be seen leading upward.  A table seems to have been used recently for the preparation of food. On the table is an elongated brown sack, smelling of hot peppers. A bottle is sitting on the table.

Rooms.Name: Attic
Rooms.Description: Why on earthwould you want to be up here.

Rooms.Name: Living Room
Rooms.Description: You are in the living room. There is a door to the east, a wooden door with strange gothic lettering to the west, which appears to be nailed shut

Items.Name: Mat
Items.Description: A rubber mat saying 'Welcome to Zork!' lies by the door.

Items.Name: MailBox
Items.Description: There is a small mailbox here.

Items.Name: Bottle
Items.Description: The glass bottle contains: A quantity of water
